physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: "#1094 Cheltenham School 1915, 17, '21 with Frieda Rodetsky Toltz (2 in oversize box)." On photograph: "5 from left Frieda Rodetsky Toltz, Cheltenham 1915?, #1094."

mods.abstract: Frieda Rodetsky Toltz poses with many other students from the Cheltenham School, Denver, Colorado.
mods.note: Accession record says original photographs were given. This is a reprint and some wording written on the photo has been cut off in the scanning and reprinting.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
